donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr: Institutional capacity of SSRDF strengthened to achieve its mandate in supporting regionally balanced development, improve livelihood opportunities and service conditions for people, through review of objectives, structure, functions and systems, and targeted capacity building.

outputs.output_descr: Institutional capacity of SSRDF strengthened to achieve its mandate in supporting regionally balanced development, improve livelihood opportunities and service conditions for people, through review of objectives, structure, functions and systems, and targeted capacity building.

project_descr: Strengthen institutional capacity of the South Sudan Rehabilitation and Development Fund (SSRDF) to achieve its mandate in supporting regionally balanced development, improve livelihood opportunities and service conditions for people.
project_title: Support to SS Reconstruction Development Fund (SSRDF)
